contents.text: Thank you for calling Aktana in San Francisco, where our AI empowers life science sales and marketing teams to support physicians.
To reach our Sales Support team, press 1.
Press 1 for a product demonstration and AI solution overview.
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales specialist for your product demonstration.

navigationGoals: Schedule a concise AI solution demo for our sales team.
I’d like a demonstration of your AI solution to help me plan my physician outreach.
Schedule a live walkthrough of Aktana’s AI-driven recommendation engine and system architecture.
I’d like someone to walk me through a live demo of your AI solution so I can understand its benefits.
I’d like to schedule a detailed walkthrough of Aktana’s AI solution and its features.

contents.text: Press 2 for technical assistance with the Aktana platform.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support for the Aktana platform.

navigationGoals: Get immediate help troubleshooting a platform error.
I’m having trouble accessing the Aktana platform and need technical support.
Troubleshoot an API integration error in the Aktana platform and optimize CRM data sync.
I’m having trouble logging into the Aktana platform and need patient technical help to get it working.
I’m encountering an error on the Aktana platform and need technical support to resolve it.

contents.text: To reach our Marketing Support team, press 2.
Press 1 for campaign planning and analytical insights.
Please hold while we connect you to our marketing analytics team.

navigationGoals: Obtain data-driven insights to plan an upcoming marketing campaign.
I want analytical insights to plan my next physician-focused marketing campaign.
Obtain advanced analytics insights for designing a targeted life-science marketing campaign.
I need guidance interpreting my marketing analytics to plan our next campaign effectively.
I’m looking for advice on designing a data-driven marketing campaign and understanding the analytical insights.

contents.text: Press 2 for training resources and onboarding support.
Please hold while we connect you to our training and onboarding team.

navigationGoals: Access quick-start training and onboarding materials for new team members.
I need onboarding materials and training to get started with Aktana.
Access onboarding modules and technical documentation to configure user roles and workflows.
I’d like step-by-step training materials and onboarding support for me and my staff on your platform.
I’m new to Aktana and want to access training materials and onboarding support.
